text: If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other.
author: Mother Teresa

text: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.
author: Elie Wiesel

text: Happiness quite unshared can scarcely be called happiness; it has no taste.
author: Charlotte Bronte

text: Love only grows by sharing. You can only have more for yourself by giving it away to others.
author: Brian Tracy

text: It ain't no fun if the homies can't have none.
author: Snoop Dogg

text: Share your knowledge. It is a way to achieve immortality.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

text: One of the most important things you can do on this earth is to let people know they are not alone.
author: Shannon L. Alder

text: If you are really thankful, what do you do? You share.
author: W. Clement Stone

text: Be willing to share your blessings. The only riches that last are the ones that are given away.
author: David Khalil

text: There is no enjoying the possession of anything valuable unless one has someone to share it with.
author: Seneca

text: I believe that the greatest crime is to learn something that can significantly benefit other people, yet share it with no one.
author: Mike Pettigrew

text: Sharing empathy is one of the most wonderful aspects of the human experience.
author: Christine Rose Elle

text: Nothing is yours. It is to use. It is to share. If you will not share it, you cannot use it.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

text: If you have a candle, the light won't glow any dimmer if I light yours off of mine.
author: Steven Tyler

text: The artist lives to have stories to tell and to learn to tell them well.
author: Criss Jami

text: For pleasure has no relish unless we share it.
author: Virginia Woolf

text: I understand that we're smarter than me. That's one reason I like the idea of sharing.
author: Toba Beta
